price: Kuma Allah Yanã kira zuwa ga gidan aminci, kuma, Yanã shiryar da wanda Yake so zuwa ga tafarki madaidaici.
arabic: وَٱللَّهُ يَدۡعُوٓاْ إِلَىٰ دَارِ ٱلسَّلَٰمِ وَيَهۡدِي مَن يَشَآءُ إِلَىٰ صِرَٰطٖ مُّسۡتَقِيمٖ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wal-lahu yadʿū ilā dāri al-salāmi wayahdī man yashāu ilā ṣirāṭin mus'taqīmin
